ja531:10.1: Abbhūti → abbhū hi (bj) | abhūti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | abbhu hi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:10.4: akantaṃ kantumicchasi → akanto kantamicchasi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:24.1: nūnāyaṃ sā → nūna ayaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja531:44.3: lambissati → lambahīti (pts-vp-pli1ed), siṅgālo → sigālo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:45.4: Siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhissanti → siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhayanti (bj) | sigālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhayanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | gayhā vako gacchati yenakāmaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:53.1: Sace ca ajja → tvaṃ amma (bj) | saceva ajja (sya1ed, sya2ed) | tvaṃ ajja (pts-vp-pli1ed), dhāresi → vāresi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:55.1: ca sisati → asso hasisati (bj) | asso hasiyati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | asso ca siṃsati (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:58.4: sabbe vadhissati → yo no dukkhā pamocaye (bj) | yo ne sabbe vadhissati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | so no sabbe vadhissatīti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:59.2: Andhabālā pabhāsasi → ādu bālāva bhāsasi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja531:68.2: duhanti vīsatiṃ → duyhanti vīsati (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | dūhanti vīsati (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja531:69.4: na naṃ → na taṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), akkhāsidhāgataṃ → akkhāsi āgataṃ (bj) | akkhāsi māgataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja531:79.2: pahu → bahuṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | bahu (sya1ed, sya2ed), titikkhisaṃ → titikkhissaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
